Queries.AddInformation: INSERT INTO users(UserName, EmailId, MobileNumber, Salary, Gender) VALUES (@UserName,@EmailId,@MobileNumber,@Salary,@Gender)
Queries.ReadAllInformation: SELECT id, UserName, EmailId, MobileNumber, Salary, Gender, isActive FROM users where isActive = 1
Queries.UpdateAllInformationById: UPDATE users SET UserName = @UserName,EmailId = @EmailId,MobileNumber = @MobileNumber,Salary = @Salary,Gender = @Gender WHERE id = @userId
Queries.GetUserInformation: SELECT id, UserName, EmailId, MobileNumber, Salary, Gender, isActive FROM users where EmailId = @EmailId
